events.name: UX and Accessibility: Making Technology Inclusive for Blind, Deaf and Disabled Users
events.description:
Sign up for free here: http://ga.co/1S8HRss

Speaker: Ken Chua (Founder, (these)abilities)

Partner: Theseabilities

Accessibility grants users the ability to perceive, engage, navigate and contribute to their environment In the sophisticated world of technology where accessibility is critical to one’s experience, there is more to be done to elevate its power and promise for the blind, deaf and disabled. What else can we do with UX to broaden technology’s reach and what are the design solutions we can build into our services and products to make them more consciously inclusive?

Join us in this presentation by the folks behind (these)abilities, a design & technology company that aims to "Disable Disabilities" by designing & building products that level the playing field for Persons with Disabilities (PwDs) at work, at home and during play. We’ll open the floor up for a candid discussion after.

events.name: How to Build your first Chatbot on Facebook Messenger
events.description:
Agenda: 7:00pm to 7:15pm - Networking  7:15pm to 8:00pm - AI & Bots : What the Future Holds by Bhagaban Behera 


8:00pm to 8:45pm -Build your First Bot on Messenger Platform (Hands-on Session) by Santosh Rout  Location: PropertyGuru HQ 51 Goldhill Plaza #11-03, Singapore -[masked] 


Note: Goldhill Plaza is a circular building visible diagonally opposite to Novena Velocity MRT Mall. Come over to the 11th floor of the Goldhill Plaza. At PG Office entrance take left into the Training Room. 


This place can sit only 50 people.
